ModMetaData.name: Traps Plus (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: shite
ModMetaData.description:
Update of shites mod for RimWorld 1.1 https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=34326.0
[img]https://raw.githubusercontent.com/emipa606/RimWorld-Wrapper/master/Notice.png[/img]
Support-chat: https://invite.gg/mlie
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/TrapsPlus
--- Original Description --- This is a mod that plans on adding more traps to the Rimworld universe. These are the current traps that are included in the mod: Bear Trap (Rearmable) Spikes Caltrops Body Crusher (Rearmable) Body Slicer (Rearmable) Heat Pad (Powered) Freeze Pad (Powered) Saws (Powered) More will be added in the future :)
If anyone would like to help me with creating better textures, please message me!
